subject: Thank you for your recent debt request, we accepted your refinance appication
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this deal will expire TONIGHT):
$478,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
http://doabcoacking.com/
